downloadTitle: What's new for Devs: Part 1 - Project Desktop Extensibility
downloadDescription: Project desktop is a popular tool for millions of Project Managers. It now incorporates the Web Extensibility Framework and allows you to build Apps for Office that display contextual contents right in Project. The demonstration will show how to build App
detailsSection: Project desktop is a popular tool for millions of Project Managers. It now incorporates the Web Extensibility Framework and allows you to build Apps for Office that display contextual contents right in Project. The demonstration will show how to build App
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Office application:
    • Microsoft Office PowerPoint
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to your desired file location.
  3. Find the file where you chose to save it and double-click it to open it.
